154.comment:
A flap that stays fixed on one side of the screen.

Functionalities:
- drop it on any side of the screen to fit it there
- drag the handle to drag it into the screen or push it out of the way
- click it to toggle between small and enlarged state (remembers the last position set)
- add a TextMorph as label by using the 'addMorphTo' menu entry and choose FlapLabel, it will automatically rotate to the correct side
- drop any morph into the FlapContent
- call setBorder(10) to set the gray border around the content to a custom size
